## Pipeline arguments

nextflow run \
https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline.git -r main_build \
-main-script workflows/ingestion/cellranger_demux/main.nf \
--help

## Table of arguments

| name           | type    | description                                           |
|:---------------|:--------|:------------------------------------------------------|
| --id           | string  | ID of the sample.                                     |
| --input        | file    | A BCL directory.                                      |
| --sample_sheet | file    | The sample sheet for the samples to be demultiplexed. |
| --cores        | integer | Set max cores the pipeline may request at one time.   |
| --memory       | integer | Set max GB the pipeline may request at one time.      |
